dcterms:description: A simulation environment for multi-agent cooperation and competition, featuring pre-defined scenarios that represent typical cases of collaboration and competition.

dcterms:description: A framework for modeling sequential decision-making problems, particularly in single-agent reinforcement learning systems.

dcterms:description: A scenario where agents must cooperate to reach a set of landmarks without communication, testing their ability to work together.
